text: Jimmy Smits (born July 9, 1955) is an American movie, television, stage, and voice actor who is known for his role as Victor Sifuentes in L.A. Law. He won an Golden Globe Award, an Emmy Award, an Saturn Award, and an Screen Actors Guild Award. Smits was born on July 9, 1955 in Brooklyn, New York City, New York.Gale – Free Resources – Hispanic Heritage – Biographies – Jimmy Smits He studied at Brooklyn College and at Cornell University. Smits was married to Barbara Smits from 1981 until they divorced in 1987. He was partners with Wanda De Jesus since 1986. With Barbara, he has two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Puerto Rican movie actors Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:Saturn Award winners Category:Puerto Rican television actors Category:Puerto Rican stage actors Category:Puerto Rican voice actors
title: Jimmy Smits
